actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

official_title: To amend part E of title IV of the Social Security Act to provide that States enact a comprehensive adoption reform program by 1993 as a condition of receiving Federal payments for foster care and adoption assistance.

summary.text: Amends part E (Foster Care and Adoption Assistance) of title IV of the Social Security Act to condition Federal part E assistance upon States having specified laws concerning adoption in effect by 1993, including laws requiring pre-placement professional assessments of parental abilities to provide for the emotional needs of the child, submission of itemized adoption costs, and guarantees of legal representation to biological mothers.

titles.title: To amend part E of title IV of the Social Security Act to provide that States enact a comprehensive adoption reform program by 1993 as a condition of receiving Federal payments for foster care and adoption assistance.
